short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive notifications when Chupetemonkey_ goes online and changes category on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to notify the followers of the chupetemonkey streamer when he starts a direct on twitch and when he changes category. When opening the extension, information about the status of the stream is shown, such as the number of viewers it has, the category and the title. As well as the links to other social networks.
